name: PotionIngredients
0:
”Alexa, ask Potion Ingredients to give me three”
”Alexa, tell Potion Ingredients I need three”
”Alexa, open Potion Ingredients”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: potion ingredients
des:
You can now ask Alexa for your potion ingredients to use in the Harry Potter: Potions Challenge Game by Spin Master!

Whenever you land on a wand space in the game, roll the die as usual, then ask Alexa to tell Potion Ingredients to give you that number of ingredients.

priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
